title: Tick History Response
description: Historic tick data for a single symbol

history.title: Tick History Response
history.description: Historic tick data for a given symbol

epoch.description: The opening time of this candle

open.description: Open price value for this candle

high.description: Highest price value for this candle

low.description: Lowest price value for this candle

close.description: Close price value for this candle

candles.description: Array of OHLC (open/high/low/close) price values for the given time (only for style='candles')

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
